column5: There is a lake a few miles before going into the beautiful area of Missanabie called Ash Lake. It is back behind a gravel pit and across the railroad tracks. Has anyone of you fishermen gone to that lake or have any info. concerning it. Hearing from you would be much appreciated. Thanks len in michigan

The very general area for this lake is between Wawa and Dalton--it is in the Chapleau game preserve--just looking for a little info. on this lake. Am willing to share info. on other secluded lakes I fish for info. on this lake.[email protected]
